title: Nasty Player to avoid
body: [Removed] is a player we should all avoid, Spams chat with insults blaming teammates for every single thing that happens, builds troll items on adc and generally just sulks when he doesn't get carried then tells people to kill themselves when they tell him off

replies.body: Don't take it to heart matey, it's just a game! At the end of the day it is meant to be an experience to enjoy. Utilise the mute and report functions and move on to the next game, of which hopefully has more positive team mates!

Hey mate, I get it. This player made the experience hell and you need to vent.
But per the current [Boards rules](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) we can't allow named reports on the Boards.
It's great that you reported them after the game, but if you feel the need to do more then you can [lodge a ticket to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may take it from there.

why should they need to do more isnt one report enough?
i constantly get called retarded and report are you saying i can do more?
